settings.apiUrl: Relay service API base URL / 中继服务 API 基础地址
settings.apiId: User API identifier (UUID format) / 用户 API 标识符
settings.apiKey: User API Key / 用户 API Key
settings.refreshInterval: Data refresh interval (seconds) / 数据更新频率（秒）
settings.enableStatusBarColors: Enable colored status bar based on usage percentage / 启用根据使用百分比变化的状态栏颜色
settings.colorThresholds: Color threshold configuration / 颜色阈值配置
settings.customColors: Custom color configuration / 自定义颜色配置
settings.enableLogging: Enable detailed logging for debugging / 启用详细日志记录以便调试
settings.language: Extension interface language / 扩展界面语言
